name: Raymond Lind
text: Of all the architecture which has survived at Trowulan, I think that Candi Bajang Ratu is the most beautiful example. This singularly elegant structure is a marvel, with its elongated proportions and well-preserved Kala heads over the door. The surrounding parkland is also well-maintained. Entrance costs 4000 rupiah.
